mapper.select: SELECT blog.id AS id, blog.title AS title, blog.content AS content, blog.create_time AS createTime, category.`name` AS categoryName, category.id AS categoryId, GROUP_CONCAT(tag.name) AS tagName FROM blog INNER JOIN category ON blog.category_id = category.id LEFT JOIN blog_tag_rel ON blog.id = blog_tag_rel.blog_id LEFT JOIN tag ON blog_tag_rel.tag_id = tag.id GROUP BY blog.id ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT blog.title AS title, blog.id AS id, blog.create_time AS createTime, category.`name` AS categoryName FROM category INNER JOIN blog ON category.id = blog.category_id WHERE category.id = #{id} ORDER BY createTime DESC
